thread.title: Hero Republican ‘TBD’ Saves the World from Donald Trump ‘TBD’ SNL Sketch
thread.title_full: Hero Republican ‘TBD’ Saves the World from Donald Trump ‘TBD’ SNL Sketch

author: Jon Levine
title: Hero Republican ‘TBD’ Saves the World from Donald Trump ‘TBD’ SNL Sketch
text:
Hero Republican ‘TBD’ Saves the World from Donald Trump ‘TBD’ SNL Sketch by Jon Levine | 11:56 pm, March 4th, 2017 
SNL’s first skit with actress Octavia Spencer opened with a joke about action movies and a Republican hero simply known as “TBD” 
“It was country in chaos, a nation divided,” intoned a stern narrator. “Led by a president with unchecked power.” 
The gag was a none too subtle jab as Congressional Republicans who have largely cowered to the new president and his ferocious Twitter account. 
“The AV Club calls it a touching tribute to whoever it ends up being about and Rolling Stone says, it’s definitely not about Paul Ryan.” 
“Courage Compassion Country … The TBD Story.” SNL
